people.name: Oleg Novitskiy
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: Veteran space traveller Oleg was just shy of the “I’ve spent an entire year in space” threshold before launching as a part of Expedition 65

people.name: Mark Vande Hei
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: This is native Virginian and retired United States Army officer Mark’s second time to space.

people.name: Pyotr Dubrov
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: An astronaut since 2012, this is Pyotr’s first time in space!

people.name: Thomas Pesquet
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: He received a master’s degree from the Ecole Nationale Supérieure de l’Aéronautique et de l’Espace in Toulouse, France. He worked at the French space agency, CNES, as a research engineer, and then went on to become a pilot for Air France where he is currently flying Airbus A320s. He enjoys jogging, swimming, squash and judo and has experience in diving and paragliding.

people.name: Megan McArthur
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: This is Megan’s second trip to space, the last was aboard the space shuttle. Fun fact: She is known as the last person to be hands on with the Hubble Space Telescope!

people.name: Shane Kimbrough
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: Texas born Shane was an Apache helicopter pilot in Operation desert storm before returning as a Colonel and earning a spot as an astronaut. He took one trip on the Space Shuttle and has completed 2 space walks.

people.name: Akihiko Hoshide
people.title: Commander
people.bio: Chosen as an astronaut in 1999, this is Akihiko’s 3rd trip to space!
